Àtụ:Infobox settlement
Isoko North bụ otu n'ime mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo abụọ (LGA) na mpaghara Isoko nke Delta Steeti, ndịda Naịjirịa nke ọzọ bụ Isoko South
Ndị bi na Isoko North bụ ihe dịka otu narị na iri na abụọ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Ozoropuku iri na anọ ere oche 14,000 Olympic size stadium na Delta State PolytechnieElectoral re 13 iri na ato Electoral Wards na Local Government Area
Obodo ukwu dị na Isoko North bụ Ozoro, Owhelogbo, Otor Owhe, Oghara-Iyede na Emevor
Ndị mmadụ bụ ndị Kraịst na ndị na-efe ofufe ọdịnala
Isoko North nwere mpaghara na-emepụta mmanụ, ọ bụkwa ebe ụfọdụ n'ime esemokwu ndị na-adịbeghị anya na Niger Delta.
